timeline.bodyText:
Looking at how this is invoked from CreateCaseEventService.createCaseEvent()
I think this could have been a little bug here. We were passing to validateOrganisationPolicy content, but that might not contain the most up to date case data. We should be using data instead
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

replies.bodyText:
Given the above, if we pass the whole CaseDataContent to the ValidationContext, we risk devs using caseDataContent.getData() rather than the more up to date data.
Therefore I think it would be better to do this:
createValidationContext(Map<String, JsonNode> data, CaseTypeDefinition caseTypeDefinition, String eventId)

where data will contain
Map<String, JsonNode> data
let's have a chat about this
